title: 第 16 集 嗨，丽莎。你的假期怎么样？ | Hi, Lisa. How was your vacation?

data.zh: 嗨，丽莎。你的假期怎么样？
data.en: Hi, Lisa. How was your vacation?

data.zh: 非常不错！ 我和我的家人去了香港。
data.en: It was great. I went to Hong Kong with my family.

data.zh: 真的吗？哇。你在那里做了什么特别的事情吗？
data.en: Really? Wow. Did you do anything special there?

data.zh: 嗯，我们去了一个有趣的公园。真的很令人兴奋。
data.en: Well, we went to a fun park. It was really exciting.

data.zh: 你去购物了没？
data.en: Did you go shopping?

data.zh: 去了。
data.en: Yeah, I did.

data.zh: 那些商店咋样？
data.en: How were the stores?

data.zh: 哦，挺贵的，不过我给我最好的朋友买了点东西。
data.en: Oh, they were very expensive, but I did buy something for my best friend.

data.zh: 那儿的人呢？友好不？
data.en: And how were the people? Were they friendly?

data.zh: 友好。我爸妈在那儿有朋友，我们在他们家吃了晚饭。
data.en: Yeah, they were really friendly. My parents have some friends there, and we had dinner at their house.

data.zh: 饭好吃不？
data.en: How was the food?

data.zh: 好吃。我喜欢他们做的家常菜。
data.en: It was delicious. I loved their home cooking.

data.zh: 大家都玩得开心不？
data.en: Did everyone have a good time?

data.zh: 是的，我们都很开心。一切都非常棒。
data.en: Oh, yes. We did. Everything was excellent.

data.zh: 7 月 15 日，星期一。
data.en: Monday, July 15th.

data.zh: 今天早上我和家人抵达了马来西亚的槟城。
data.en: I arrived in Penang in Malaysia this morning with my family.

data.zh: 天气晴朗炎热，
data.en: It was sunny and hot,

data.zh: 所以我们决定去酒店附近的海滩。
data.en: So we decided to go to the beach near our hotel.

data.zh: 我和姐姐尝试了滑翔伞。
data.en: My sister and I tried paragliding.

data.zh: 我感觉自己像一只鸟。
data.en: I felt like I was a bird.

data.zh: 那真是太刺激了！
data.en: It was so exciting！

data.zh: 午餐时，我们吃了非常特别的马来西亚黄面。
data.en: For lunch, we had something very special Malaysian yellow noodles.

data.zh: 他们很好吃！
data.en: They were delicious.

data.zh: 下午，我们骑自行车去了乔治市。
data.en: In the afternoon, we rode bicycles to Georgetown.

data.zh: 现在有很多新建筑，但许多老建筑仍然在那里。
data.en: There are a lot of new buildings now, but many of the old buildings are still there.

data.zh: 在乔治市一个非常古老的地方 —— 韦尔德码头，
data.en: In Weld Quay, a really old place in Georgetown,

data.zh: 我们看到了 100 年前中国商人的房子。
data.en: we saw the houses of the Chinese traders from 100 years ago.

data.zh: 我很好奇过去这里的生活是什么样的。
data.en: I wonder what life was like here in the past.

data.zh: 我真的很喜欢在这个小镇上四处走走。
data.en: I really enjoyed walking around the town.

data.zh: 7 月 16 日，星期二。
data.en: Tuesday, July 16th.

data.zh: 一天的变化真大！
data.en: What a difference a day makes!

data.zh: 我和爸爸决定今天去槟城山。
data.en: My father and I decided to go to Penang Hill today.

data.zh: 我们本想步行到山顶，但后来下起了小雨，
data.en: We wanted to walk to the top, but then it started raining a little,

data.zh: 于是我们决定乘火车。
data.en: so we decided to take the train.

data.zh: 我们等了一个多小时火车，因为人太多了。
data.en: We waited over an hour for the train because there were too many people.

data.zh: 当我们到达山顶时，雨下得非常大。
data.en: When we got to the top, it was raining really hard.

data.zh: 我们没有带伞，所以又湿又冷。
data.en: We didn't have an umbrella, so we were wetand cold.

data.zh: 太糟糕了！
data.en: It was terrible!

data.zh: 由于恶劣的天气，我们什么也看不见。
data.en: And because of the bad weather, we couldn't see anything below.

data.zh: 我的爸爸并没有带来足够的钱，所以我们只有一个碗里的大米和一些鱼。
data.en: My father didn't bring enough money, so we only had one bowl of rice and some fish.

data.zh: 因为我太饿了，所以食物尝起来很棒！
data.en: The food tasted great because I was so hungry!
